recipe.title: Chunky Tomato and Black Olive Salad
ingredients: 4 large plum tomatoes, cored, cut into 3/4-inch pieces
1/3 cup brine-cured black olives (such as Kalamata) , pitted, halved
1/3 cup very thinly sliced red onion
1 large bunch arugula, stems trimmed, cut into wide ribbons
instructions: Combine tomatoes, black olives and onion in medium bowl. Add olive oil and balsamic vinegar; toss to blend well. Season salad to taste with salt and pepper. Mix in arugula and serve.
